arm_group.description: Male or female who will undergo a sleeve gastrectomy for obesity by Dr. Drake Bellanger.

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a questionnaire asking about the sleeve gastrectomy surgery and how has it altered
      food preferences before and after surgery.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Sleeve Gastrectomy on Food Preference

detailed_description.textblock:
Participants that will undergo the sleeve gastrectomy surgery by Dr. Drake Bellanger's, will
      be asked to participant in a questionnaire survey.  Once given the consent to participate, a
      food preference questionnaire (FPQ) will be administered at a pre-operative visit and then a
      six-week follow up visit at Dr. Drake Bellanger's office.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Male or Female, 18 years or over, who will undergo a sleeve gastrectomy for obesity
             by Dr. Drake Bellanger.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Women who are pregnant or nursing.

study_pop.textblock: Dr. Drake Bellanger sleeve gastrectomy surgery

intervention.description: Dr. Ballanger's office will administer a FPQ upon approval of an informed consent.  Subjects will be asked to complete the questionnaire at a pre-operative visit and six weeks post-operatively.

clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Sleeve Gastrectomy on Food Preference

primary_outcome.description: A list of food items are on a questionnaire asking food preferences, Breads, Cereals, Grain products, Fruits and Juices, Fats and oils, Milk, etc. which allows the subjects to select their food preferences before and after the surgery.
primary_outcome.measure: Participants food preferences before sleeve gastrectomy surgery and after surgery.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline in preferences after follow-up six weeks

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: A participant is weighted at baseline visit and follow-up visit 6 weeks after the surgery.
secondary_outcome.measure: Participants weight change  before sleeve gastrectomy surgery and after surgery focusing on specific macronutrient.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline in weight after follow-up six weeks
